line_1: Sure Barns's Verse itself can recommend:
line_2: What need was there to send it by a Friend?

line_1: When you the social Duties recommend;

line_2: Then know, the modest swain, my friend,

line_1: "One precept more I fain would recommend,
line_2: "And then old Chiron's tedious lessons end.

line_1: Oh grant a poet leave to recommend,
line_2: (A poet fond of nature and your friend)

line_1: To what the wise shall recommend,
Whom each endearing name could recommend,
line_2: Whom all became, wife, sister, daughter, friend,
Me to the care of his once dearest Friend;

line_1: And wound the grace I mean to recommend,
line_2: But lest I seem to sin against a friend,

line_1: That commerce now in vain you recommend,
line_2: I dread the latent lover in the friend;

line_1: First, my young soldier, let me recommend,
line_2: In life's fair spring to make your God your friend;

line_1: Temp'rance, dear youth, I warmly recommend,
line_2: In fumes of wine too oft is lost a friend;
